creditline: Collection of Yvonne and Gabriel P. Weisberg
description: cat. 25; seated old woman; bar on one side; table with flowers and window view of sailing ships; gold trim; green mat; medium stained wood frame with many ridges
medium: Watercolor over charcoal heightened with white gouache on cream wove paper laid down on board
text: This powerful portrait of an elderly Breton woman shows Georges Scott's prodigious talent as a watercolorist. The reflection of the potted plants in the shiny tabletop and the delicate texture of the woman's lace bonnet are just two examples of his admirable technical ability. Scott was known for his military pictures of World War I, so this early drawing comes as something of a revelation.
title: Old Breton Woman in a Caf√©
